about_the_game:
I renewed the game as a Steam game after releasing it on IOS in 2019.

app. famitsu . com  /20190323_1429195/

A cat is traveling from the sea to the village in a boat.

Use your mouse to catch the fish caught in the boat's net.

 

Once in town, I took over the sushi restaurant on the left.

I needed a chef, so I scouted the chef at the restaurant on the right.

I went out to sea again, this time to catch fish for cooking.

One day, you plan to take over the restaurant on the right and open restaurants in all the other towns.

You can find more tips on how to play the game in the “Help” tab in the top right corner of the screen.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Number of sailings : The number of times you can sail. 1 charge every 10 minutes

  • Boats : A boat that can catch fish and travel to other towns. Can be upgraded for money or stones.

  • Numbers under ships in the sea : The number of fish caught in the net. When the net is full, the sailors start fishing.

  • The number at the bottom of the sea : The number of fish caught in the boat. You can upgrade your ship to increase its capacity.

  • The number above the “You” signpost on the sea map : The remaining distance to the town. When it reaches 0, you've arrived.

  • Marlin : A valuable fish that can be sold for 2 stones. Every hour on the hour, there is a 33% chance of being caught in the net.

  • Sea Shop : Occasionally appears during a voyage.  1 Items that can increase the maximum level of clerks and sailors: Usuba, Yasuri, Oars, Fishing Rods, etc.  2 Items in the Culinary Roulette that can increase the price of dishes: rice, miso, soy sauce, onions, green onions, garlic, etc.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • My ship : By clicking on your ship, you can customize several settings. Choose a sailor cat to ride on your ship. Upgrade your ship. Send your boat out to catch fish on its own for a certain amount of time. The more crew, the faster the time

  • My shop : You can sell the caught fish as dishes. You can open a shop for a certain amount of money.

  • Rival shops on the right : You can scout chefs and hire them as chefs for your shop. If you have scouted them all, you can open the shop after the acquisition.

  • Signs in front of the shop : Displays the number of customers waiting to eat. You can see the maximum number of guests in the town on the top town map. It resets after one in-game day (10 minutes). After you have traveled to 6 villages, you can start transporting customers to your boat.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Money : A commodity that can be spent in the game. It is increased by selling fish wholesale or selling them as dishes in your shop. The price of dishes is increased by upgrading your clerks, or by the number of points you earn in the Culinary Roulette. Money can be spent on upgrading your ship, the Sea Store, opening a shop, and more.

  • Stones : Earned by selling marlin. You can spend it on upgrading your ship, opening a Shop, scouting for Chefs, hiring sailors, and buying ingredients.

  • Pearls : Obtained for money in the Purchase window. They can be used to purchase items in the Purchase Window. You can also get them in the nightly Game Center.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Fish Locker : Allows you to store the fish you catch. It can also be shared among all Towns.

  • Fan Cat and Playing Cat : Dances and plays on the ship.

  • Hostel Cat : Runs the Hostel in Kalchon. You can see 3 lodgings when you enter the shop. You can earn income only after a day in the game.

  • Bathhouse Manager Cat : Manages the Bathhouse on the first floor of Kalchon. If you have purchased chickens, you can sell their eggs in the sauna inside the bathhouse. Eggs are earned after one day in-game.

  • Secretary : Reports on the status of fish in the shops in each Town, the arrival of Town ships, and more. Click on the secretary on the ship to reveal a checklist.

  • Shop Display Items : Click on the bulletin board in front of your Shop to select a clerk and choose items to display in your Shop. Displayed items increase the value of your food. The Coke TV can be clicked to turn the TV on or off.

  • Parrot : When sailing at sea, it will show you shortcuts to speed up your arrival time.

  • Harpoon Cat : You can catch Big Tuna that appear when sailing. Click on the tuna to get a 50% chance to catch it yourself

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Scouting a Chef will reveal a Roulette of that dish. Roulette ingredients can be purchased at the Sea Shop.

The price of the dish is increased by the number of points earned on the roulette in %.

name: cats diner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows xp over
  • Processor: intel pentium 4
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: on board vga
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 44.1kHz
  • VR Support: x

short_description: Hire cats to run a sushi restaurant. You will cook the fish you catch in the sea in your sushi restaurant. To get to other towns, you need a boat and cats to row it.
